title: This Game Keeps Me Up At Night

media:group.media:title: This Game Keeps Me Up At Night
media:group.media:description:
This is one of my favorite mathematical thought exercises! I promise you'll like it too. 

The prisoner's dilemma is one of (is?) the most famous examples in mathematical game theory. The game is sort of a paradox since it appears both players would be better of cooperating, yet the best decision (for both players) is to defect (not cooperate)!
